'''Treasure Hoarder Scouting Report''' is a Quest Item obtained after talking to [[Vile]] during the ''Meteoric Wave '' Quest [["That Guy"'s Scheme]] in the [[Unreconciled Stars]] event.

Vile will give you 3 Treasure Hoarder Scouting Reports to be planted in the quest.
